title: Moving Forward While Letting Go
description: Moving Forward While Letting Go is a powerfully written true story of triumph and success in the face of the unthinkable. From abuse to the woes of failed relationships, Author Karen D. McMillan is leaving no stone unturned. Written from a place of transparency, each page is crafted to give the reader a front row seat to witness survival and the process of overcoming adversity in action. In her debut book, Karen shares her truth with a refreshing dose of entertaining realness. Known as the Soul Coach, Karen is a life coach who aims to encourage her clients to overcome any obstacle life throws their way. By sharing her own story, Karen has become living proof that nothing can stop a person who is determined to succeed in life!
author: Karen Diana McMillan
